survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Air Quality Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the air quality in their workplace, identifying areas for improvement to enhance overall well-being and productivity.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the air quality in your primary workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for radio buttons.

script.question_text: How would you rate the air quality in your primary workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture overlapping issues. Ensure checkboxes are clearly labeled.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge severity of the issue. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workspace?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance air quality in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Has poor air quality in your workspace ever affected your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no scale with gradation to assess impact. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: Has poor air quality in your workspace ever affected your productivity?
